AD_LocalChat.synopsis: A couple of travelers accidentally bumped in a nobleman's cart with their own. The Flaming Fist packed them in. They're not in trouble, but they don't know that, and the FF love making them sweat.
AD_LocalChat.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-11;50;200)- Dialogue should start automatically.

Man.synopsis: A couple of travelers accidentally bumped in a nobleman's cart with their own. The Flaming Fist packed them in. They're not in trouble, but they don't know that, and the FF love making them sweat.This is the man's one-liner
Man.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-11;50;200)- Talk to the man of the vignette

Woman.synopsis: A couple of travelers accidentally bumped in a nobleman's cart with their own. The Flaming Fist packed them in. They're not in trouble, but they don't know that, and the FF love making them sweat.This is the women's one-liner
Woman.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-11;50;200)- Talk to the woman of the vignette

AD_LocalChat_2.speaker: Bering Gahorst
AD_LocalChat_2.text: Are they going to arrest us? What if they throw us in jail?

AD_LocalChat_0.speaker: Sister Franchot
AD_LocalChat_0.text: Calm down, dear. It won't happen, I swear.

AD_LocalChat_4.speaker: Bering Gahorst
AD_LocalChat_4.text: Our cart barely grazed that patriar. He wasn't even hurt!

AD_LocalChat_1.speaker: Sister Franchot
AD_LocalChat_1.text: That's why nothing's going to happen to us. We'll tell them what happened, and we'll be home in no time.

AD_LocalChat_3.speaker: Bering Gahorst
AD_LocalChat_3.text: You've been saying that for ages, and we're still here. What are they waiting for?

AD_LocalChat_5.speaker: Sister Franchot
AD_LocalChat_5.text: I don't know dear, I don't know. All we can do is be patient.

Man_0.speaker: Bering Gahorst
Man_0.text: I've never committed a crime in my life - that has to count for something. It has to.

Man_1.speaker: Bering Gahorst
Man_1.text: You heard anything about what it's like in the prisons? Actually, don't tell me. I don't want to know.

Woman_0.speaker: Sister Franchot
Woman_0.text: It's not like we've done anything wrong. They can't arrest us for an accident.

Woman_1.speaker: Sister Franchot
Woman_1.text: It's the waiting that's hard. If we could just talk to one of the Fists, it'd be as clear as day that we're not criminals.
